articles.description: Attention all businesses using MOVEit Transfer! Progress Software has just rolled out critical patches to address new SQL injection flaws.
articles.content: Progress Software, the company behind the MOVEit Transfer application, has released patches to address brand new SQL injection vulnerabilities affecting the file transfer solution that could enable t… [+2501 chars]
